author: fradamt
content: If the shuffle is different in two competing branches, PB doesn't help because there isn't a single proposer. It helps only as long as you have two competing branches but a single proposer that can choose between them

author: fradamt
content: Yeah I agree, I don't think rolling out this change in an uncoordinated way would make anything worse than it currently is. On the other hand it doesn't really matter to roll it out soon, so I am fine with either option
